quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: There is no greater accomplishment in life than pushing yourself to the limit, always! Isn’t that so? That’s all there is to it!

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: Wherever there is hope, there is most definitely despair.

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: You know, isn't it said that life has its ups and downs? It's fun because downs come after ups, but if life was full of downs, wouldn't it get boring?

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: If you make light of other people's emotions, it will surely come back to bite you.

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: Real strength only reveals itself when one is faced with great turmoil! Therefore, I shall always tread a thorny path!

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: Also, the "fear" experience is a little different from yours, I imagine. You're afraid of what you might lose, right? But I'm afraid of what I've already lost.

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: Girls could never understand the passionate bonds that we men share. Male friendship is a bond that runs thicker than blood!

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: Every living person is bound to have embarrassing memories and things that they want to keep secret.

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: I'm rather proud of my ability to tell lies. I can trick not only others, but even my own heart.

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: It's okay to feel depressed. It takes time to overcome things. And then, by taking that time, you just start moving forward again. That's just what humans do.

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: I came to realize something. Parenthesis are amazing! No matter how negative something sounds, if you throw "LOL" in some parentheses behind it - it becomes positive!

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: A suicide means you've killed the most important existence of all: yourself.

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: I guess not knowing someone doesn't mean you don't understand them.

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: No matter who the enemy may be, those who can't adapt will be the first to die.

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: A hint is one thing, but simply sharing the answer it leads to is dangerous.

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: So everyone just pretends to understand... and pretends to be understood.

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: Everyone's birthplace and upbringing is different. It's obviously impossible for them to understand each other.

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: It is not the strong or the smart that survive, but the ones who can bring about change.

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: Despair is contagious. Everyone catches it.

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: Fear is proof that your imagination is functioning. Frankly, I feel bad for anyone who can't feel fear. Without imagination, you can never deduce which action to take next.

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: Sakura-chan would probably say "Strength can only be obtained by standing up to adversity. So I choose to walk down the path filled with thorns."

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: A man's weight consists nothing but what he burdens himself with.

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: It's odd, isn't it? People die everyday and the world goes on like nothing happened.

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: If the world outside is void of hope, and if despair is contagious, then I'll just have to infect everyone with my hope. Living in despair really isn't living at all.

quotes.show: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
quotes.quote: Disrupt law and order, and you get punished for it. Isn't that how society works?

quotes.show: Danganronpa The Animation
quotes.quote: For me, despair is not a goal, or a set of principles, or a lifestyle, or even an instinct... It's what defines me as Junko Enoshima! It's just my characterization! That's why I'm able to pursue despair with such purity!
